DiminishedMagicReason.Title: Diminished Magic Reason
Items: There was a portal to another plane located within the kingdom and some of its magic bled over into this realm, disrupting the balance.
A god cursed the kingdom after one of its residents committed heresy in its name.
The kingdom dabbled in magics so potent, they've disrupted the natural balance of the land for a very long time.
In ancient times there was a battle fought here and deadly magics were unleashed that scarred the landscape. Since then, magic of the same type has had trouble succeeding.
